forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny, with a high near 64. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the early morning swells with the promise of an overcast day in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle whisper of drizzle may linger before the sun embarks on its ascent. The air holds a coolness, dipping to rest around 56 degrees, while the west-southwest wind carries a soft invitation to venture out, albeit with a light touch. The drizzling that hinted at fleeting appearances before 11 a.m. adds just a dash of intrigue to the otherwise muted atmosphere, painting the sky with veils of gray and a hint of shimmering possibility.

Come Thursday afternoon, the clouds will begin to part slightly, offering moments of sun amidst the urban canvas bathed in soft light. With temperatures expected to reach 64 degrees, one could feel the day's charm emerging as the breezy whispers of wind flirt with one's attire. A light jacket or sweater will fend off the coolness without dampening the hopeful spirit. With the fog rolling around the Golden Gate, a walk along the waterfront beckons, inviting leisurely exploration among the gentle undulations of the bay. Perhaps a visit to a cozy café, or wandering through the vibrant streets to soak in the subtle beauty of a city waking up, would be simply delightful under these serene conditions.
